Blog.post: Ahh im so excited. I got a job at Quiznos today. Gal thanks so much for telling your manager bout me. I love you for that. Well u know i love u like my sister. But u know. Nevermind. Im so excited. Im starting on Friday. I can't wait. I'm going to look like an idiot cause of that hat and shirt i have to wear. But honestly i dont care cause i got a job. I'll write back when something else happens. Love always Lee

Wow yesterday was amazing. Let me just say that i absolutely love ally coakley. But ne way yesterday me and her modeled at the mary kay international face show. It was bad in the begining, but in the end it was fun. If anything it was interesting right gal. LoL. Then we went to the movies later and saw white chicks. Omg that movie is hilarious you should see it. It's amazing. Gal ur ass is mine, im coming *****. lmao. Ha ha.Ilove you. Then we started talking about jobs. If starbucks dosn't work out im goin to Quiznos. You know it too. But im still praying that Starbucks is going to hire me. Today is Viveks B-day. So if you get to talk to him wish him a happy b-day. Well i'll write back when something else happens. Love always Lee

Hey guys i just got a blog. Im soo excited. Alot of people were doin the xanga thing and i just got really bored of it. It was annoying after a while. But ne way yesterday was weapon line try outs. I think i made it. I almost threw a cuad. I was so close. But i think that me and the gals made it in. It's insane. Weapon line 04-05 is going to be hot. No joke. I love it. Can't wait till my *crush* gets back from cali. Only a couple more weeks. Yey. Well I'll write back soon. lOVE Always Lee

-Ahh. I had my physical yesterday and i grew and inch and 1/4. Im so happy about that. But whats sad is that the tallest i will ever be is 5 feet 4 inches. Thats depressing. But w/e. Im just happy i grew. -Gal just a heads up im off from work on wednesday so give me a call. I need to work on the sabre work that anthony gave us. - Practice today and it's raining. Great time to get muddy. Love always lee
How to make a CapuchinoChica Ingredients: 3 parts friendliness 5 parts brilliance 5 parts beauty Add to a cocktail shaker and mix vigorously. Add a little fitness if desired!
Getting burned by someone sucks. Sooooooo bad. It hurts like crazy. Trying to get over it. Love lee

My best friend in the entire world sent me this poem. Here it is. I asked my little angels to look after you, And not to let you frown. To cheer you up when times are rough, Or whenever you feel down. I hope they take good care of you And bring you lots of love, Because I called upon them especially From Heaven up above. Take care chica...you'll find better days! Gal i love you thanks you so much.

Aries - Your Love Profile Your positive traits: You're quite the charmer. You've got the wit and attitude to attract almost anyone you meet. Out spoken and honest, any date knows how they stand with you. Fearless, independent, and willing to try anything twice - your dates should expect the unexpected. Your negative traits: You tend to be vain, and you expect your partner to feed that vanity often with complements. Hot tempered and impulsive, you've occasionally ended things ... only to reget it later. You're obsessed with being the best, most loved girlfriend or boyfriend your sweetie's ever had Your ideal partner: A risk taking, free spirit like yourself - who can keep up with your latest wild child antics Someone stylish, attractive, and fit... who can keep you attracted for months Is hard to get - and lets you pursue things. You prefer to be the chaser, not the one being chased. Your dating style: Wild, unpredictable, fun, and daring. Your ideal date may involve a couple motorcycles or naked skydiving. Your seduction style: Honest and direct - you have no need for romance or much foreplay. Show off. You like to show your lover how you're the best ever. Ambitious. You often like to go all night - or aim for multiple orgasms. Tips for the future: Start to believe in second and third chances. You don't have to dump them so fast. Savor the process. Sometimes the best part of falling in love is taking things in slow motion. Let go of comparisons. If someone's with you, then you've already one. Stop worrying about exes. Best place to meet someone online: Match.com - honest and straightforward profiles, just how you like them! Best color to attract mate:Red Best day for a date: Tuesday Get your free love profile at "www.blogthings.com"

Hey guys im so frustrated. Man i can't get my lefts down on riffle. It's such a pain. AN dhte funny thing is that i can do sabre fine. I just can't seem to do anything on riffle. Other than tripples and our work. But its just so frustrating. Uh . I'll write back when something else happens Love always Lee

Today was my first day at Quiznos. It was hectic. And we were so busy. It's alot harder working at Quiznos than i thought. Especially memorizing the sandwiches. Since there is a whole 26 of them on the menu. It is a pain to memorize them. Uh. But it's all fun still. I love it, but it is hard as hell. I have to work on Sunday from 3 till 9:30. Its going to be a long day.Im jumping for joy already. Thats so sarcastic, but whatever. Ill write back soon. Love Always Lee
